# ========== Unity Generated Files ==========

# Ignore these directories
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Ignore these files
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.pidb.meta

# ========== OS-Specific Files ==========

# macOS
.DS_Store
*.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Windows
Thumbs.db
Thumbs.db:encryptable
desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Linux
.Trash-*/

# ========== IDE-Specific Files ==========

# Visual Studio
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.idea/
*.iml
*.iws

# MonoDevelop
*.pidb
*.userprefs

# VSCode
.vscode/

# ========== Unity Asset Store Tools ==========

# Asset Store Tools
/Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# ========== Version Control ==========

# Git
*.git/
*.gitignore
.git/

# ========== Large and Build Files ==========

# Build artifacts
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage
*.ipa

# Large Assets
*.mp4
*.mov
*.avi
*.mkv
*.wav
*.flac

# Exclude auto-generated files by Unity
*.generated.meta
